citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50 pm to
1:20 pm on 11-Jun-19.
Contact was made with the licensee and it was relayed that no one would be available to walk the inspector
through the inspection process for the rest of the day.

narrative:

  Contact was made with the licensee and it was relayed that no one would be available to walk the inspector
